item.title: 独家：日本应"果断"应对债券抛售，在野党党首表示
item.description: 日本应果断采取行动应对过度市场波动，例如回购政府债券或减少超长期国债发行。有影响力的反对党领导人玉木雄一郎周三向路透社表示。【原文：Japan should act decisively against excessive market moves, such as by buying back government bonds or reducing issuance of super-long notes, Yuichiro Tamaki, head of an influential opposition party, told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国法官允许专家在强生公司诉讼案中作证称滑石粉产品致癌
item.description: 在数千名女性起诉强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）的案件中，联邦法官周二作出裁决，允许原告在庭审中提交支持婴儿爽身粉等滑石粉产品与卵巢癌存在关联的专家证词。此案源于原告指控该公司产品导致她们罹患卵巢癌。【原文：In a victory for thousands of women suing Johnson & Johnson over claims that the company's baby powder and other talc products caused their ovarian cancer, a federal judge on Tuesday ruled that they will be allowed to present testimony at trial from experts who support that link.】

item.title: 亚洲股市延续跌势，全球债券暴跌引发新一轮担忧
item.description: 亚洲股市周三连续第三个交易日下跌，因美国总统特朗普在达沃斯演讲前夕威胁收购格陵兰岛引发紧张局势升级，而全球债券抛售潮目前似乎有所放缓。【原文：Asian stocks extended their losses for a third session on Wednesday, undone by heightened tensions over U.S. threats to acquire Greenland ​ahead of President Donald Trump's Davos speech, while a global bond rout appeared to slow for now.】

item.title: 美元下跌，因"卖美国"交易重燃；日元因日本财政担忧而暴跌
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元和瑞士法郎汇率持续低迷，徘徊在近三周低点附近。此前白宫对格陵兰岛的威胁引发了美国资产的全面抛售，从美元汇率到华尔街股票及美国国债均受冲击。【原文：The dollar languished near three-week lows against the euro ​and Swiss franc on Wednesday after White House threats over Greenland triggered a broad selloff in U.S. ‌assets, from the currency to Wall Street stocks and Treasury bonds.】

item.title: 哈里伯顿在招聘网站发布职位，迈出重返委内瑞拉可能的第一步
item.description: 哈里伯顿公司1月16日发布招聘公告称，正在委内瑞拉招募工程师、技术人员等各类岗位人才，此举表明该公司可能重返这个南美国家。【原文：Halliburton is seeking resumes for a range of positions in Venezuela, including engineers and technicians, according to a job board posting from the oilfield service company dated January 16, signalling a potential move back to the South American country.】

item.title: 特朗普签署行政令，限制华尔街公司购买独栋住宅
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周二签署了一项行政命令，旨在阻止华尔街投资者与个人购房者竞争。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Tuesday aiming to stop Wall Street investors from competing with individual homebuyers, the White House said.】

item.title: 特斯拉网络出租车Optimus的产量初期将"极其缓慢"，随后逐步提升，马斯克如是说。
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克周二表示，该公司Cybercab自动驾驶出租车和人形机器人Optimus的初期产量将"令人痛苦地缓慢"，但随着时间推移将逐步提升。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Tuesday that early production rate of the company's Cybercab robotaxi and its humanoid robot Optimus will be "agonizingly slow" before accelerating over time.】

item.title: WTI原油价格下跌，因哈萨克斯坦停产风险消退
item.description: 周三，西德克萨斯中质原油价格下跌，因地缘政治紧张局势带来的压力以及美国原油库存预期增加，抵消了哈萨克斯坦两个大型油田暂时停产的影响。【原文：West Texas Intermediate crude oil prices fell on Wednesday as pressure from geopolitical tensions and an expected build up in U.S. crude inventories outweighed a temporary halt in output at two large fields in Kazakhstan.】

item.title: Zipline凭借美国无人机配送业务押注，估值飙升至76亿美元
item.description: Zipline周二宣布，在最新融资轮中筹集了6亿美元，使这家美国无人机配送初创企业的估值达到76亿美元。随着投资者对末端自动配送的兴趣日益浓厚，该公司的估值水涨船高。【原文：Zipline said on Tuesday that it has raised $600 million in its latest funding round, valuing the U.S. drone ​delivery startup at $7.6 billion, as investor interest grows in last-mile autonomous ‌delivery.】

item.title: 伯克希尔可能减持27.5%的卡夫亨氏股份，文件显示
item.description: 根据监管文件显示，伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司可能出售其持有的卡夫亨氏27.5%股权，从而退出这项持续十余年却未能为集团董事长沃伦·巴菲特带来理想回报的投资。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway may shed its 27.5% stake in Kraft Heinz , ‌according to a regulatory filing, and exit a more than decade-old investment that did not work out for the conglomerate's Chairman Warren Buffett.】

item.title: 独家：三菱日联金融集团信托银行部门计划四年内将另类资产规模翻倍至100亿美元
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（MUFG）旗下信托银行部门计划在四年内将自有资金管理的另类资产规模翻倍至约1.6万亿日元（100亿美元），一位高管表示，此举正值日本利率上升之际。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group's (MUFG) trust banking arm aims to double alternative assets under management in its own funds to around 1.6 trillion yen ($10 billion) over four years, an executive said, as interest rates rise in Japan.】

item.title: 中国无法强迫消费者购买商品，因此它依靠服务业来推动经济发展。
item.description: 中国正计划推出新措施以促进服务业消费，押注养老、医疗和休闲服务能抵消商品需求疲软的局面。不过分析人士指出，该计划能否成功取决于能否提高家庭收入和社会福利水平。【原文：China is planning to introduce new measures to promote the consumption of services, betting that elderly care, healthcare and leisure can offset tepid demand for goods, though analysts say the plan's success hinges on elevating household incomes and social welfare.】

item.title: Airwallex以80亿美元估值完成融资后收购韩国Paynuri
item.description: Airwallex已收购韩国Paynuri有限公司，由此获得当地支付牌照及外汇业务注册资格，这将使这家澳大利亚创立的金融科技公司得以在韩国直接开展业务，进一步拓展其在亚洲的业务版图。【原文：Airwallex has acquired South Korea's Paynuri Co Ltd, securing local payments licences and a foreign-exchange business registration that will allow it to operate directly in the country as the Australia-founded fintech expands in Asia.】

item.title: 菲瑞·威廉姆斯演绎路易威登男装系列的低调优雅
item.description: 路易威登男装设计师法瑞尔·威廉姆斯于周二以低调优雅的沉稳色调系列拉开巴黎时装周序幕。【原文：Louis Vuitton men's designer Pharrell Williams on Tuesday presented a collection of understated elegance in muted tones to kick off Paris Fashion Week.】

item.title: SkyBridge押注波动性上升，对比特币持谨慎乐观态度，斯卡拉穆奇表示
item.description: 另类资产管理公司SkyBridge Capital创始人安东尼·斯卡拉穆奇在瑞士达沃斯表示，随着特朗普政府政策不确定性加剧市场波动，该公司正进一步转向宏观策略。【原文：Alternative asset manager SkyBridge Capital is tilting further towards macro strategies as policy uncertainty under U.S. President Donald ​Trump's administration fuels market swings, founder Anthony Scaramucci said in Davos, Switzerland.】

item.title: 威普罗首席执行官认为人工智能领域对印度IT服务的需求日益增长
item.description: 威普罗首席执行官斯里尼·帕利亚表示，随着企业从人工智能测试部署转向大型项目，人工智能正成为印度软件服务提供商竞相争夺的技术交易基础。【原文：Artificial intelligence is underpinning technology deals that Indian software services providers are competing for, as companies move from AI test deployments to large projects, Wipro CEO Srini Pallia said.】

item.title: 交易日格陵兰岛之外，陷入亏损
item.description: 周二，美国总统特朗普威胁重启贸易战，加之因格陵兰岛问题与欧洲关系恶化，令投资者感到不安，导致股市、债市和美元汇率全面下跌，避险资产黄金价格则再创新高。【原文：Stocks, bonds and the dollar tumbled on Tuesday, as U.S. President Donald Trump's threat to reignite a trade war and sour relations with Europe over Greenland rattled investors, propelling safe-haven gold to yet another record high.】

item.title: 美国法官命令Cemtrex前高管返还非法所得
item.description: 曼哈顿一名美国法官周二裁定，制造企业Cemtrex的创始人兼前首席执行官需就美国证券交易委员会提起的证券欺诈案，支付970万美元的非法所得及利息。【原文：A U.S. judge in Manhattan on Tuesday ordered the founder and former CEO of manufacturing firm Cemtrex to pay $9.7 million of ill-gotten gains and interest in a case brought by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission over securities fraud.】

item.title: 澳大利亚莱纳斯稀土公司季度营收激增，得益于价格上涨
item.description: 澳大利亚莱纳斯稀土公司周三报告称，其第二季度营收增长43%，原因是销售价格上涨抵消了西澳大利亚州加工厂电力中断导致的产量短缺。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths reported a 43% rise in second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, as higher selling prices cushioned a production shortfall caused by power disruptions at its Western Australia processing facility.】

item.title: 力拓第四季度铁矿石出货量增长7%
item.description: 力拓集团周三报告称，其第四季度铁矿石出货量增长7%，得益于皮尔巴拉地区创纪录的季度产量以及铁路和港口装运表现强劲。【原文：Rio Tinto , reported a 7% rise in its fourth-quarter iron ore shipments on Wednesday, aided by record quarterly production from Pilbara operations and strong rail and port outload performance.】

item.title: 耐克重组区域领导层，旨在强化关键市场
item.description: 运动服饰巨头耐克周二宣布，已任命欧洲、中东和非洲（EMEA）、大中华区、亚太区及拉丁美洲地区的新任负责人，以期在关键国际市场重振业务势头。【原文：Sportswear giant Nike said on Tuesday it had appointed new leaders for its Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA), Greater China as well as Asia Pacific and Latin America regions, as it works to rebuild momentum in key international markets.】

item.title: 清街公司美国IPO文件显示营收激增，新股上市势头强劲
item.description: 清街资本在2025年前九个月的收入实现翻倍增长，这家华尔街公司周二在提交的美国首次公开募股文件中披露了这一数据。随着新股上市的繁忙年景逐渐成形，该公司业绩持续攀升。【原文：Clear Street's revenue more ‌than doubled in the first nine months of 2025, the Wall Street firm revealed on Tuesday in its U.S. initial public offering paperwork, as a busy year for new listings takes shape.】

item.title: 美联航对高端旅行需求强劲持乐观预期
item.description: 美联航周二发布了对当前季度及全年业绩的乐观展望，得益于高收入旅客和商务旅客的强劲需求。【原文：United Airlines on Tuesday issued an upbeat outlook for the current quarter and the full year, buoyed by strong demand from higher‑income and corporate travelers.】

item.title: 巴西发布建议，要求X公司通过Grok平台打击虚假性化内容
item.description: 巴西政府和联邦检察官向埃隆·马斯克旗下的社交媒体公司X发出建议，要求其通过旗下Grok聊天机器人阻止虚假性化内容的传播。【原文：Brazil's government and federal prosecutors issued a recommendation for Elon Musk's social media firm X to prevent the circulation of fake sexualized content through its Grok chatbot.】

item.title: 奈飞营收超预期，用户数达3.25亿
item.description: 奈飞公司周二表示，其假日季度营收超出华尔街预期，订阅用户数突破3.25亿。【原文：Netflix exceeded ​Wall Street's revenue estimates for its holiday quarter, as it crossed 325 million ‌subscribers, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，GoldenTree将收购约2亿美元的萨克斯全球破产融资。
item.description: 彭博新闻周二援引知情人士消息报道，全球资产管理公司GoldenTree将收购奢侈品零售商Saks Global价值10亿美元破产融资中的一部分。【原文：Global asset ​management firm GoldenTree will ‌buy a chunk of a $1 billion bankruptcy financing for luxury retailer Saks Global, Bloomberg News ‌reported on Tuesday, citing ​people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 五角大楼称，美国国务院批准向新加坡出售价值23亿美元的飞机和鱼雷
item.description: 美国国务院已批准向新加坡出售海上巡逻侦察机、轻型鱼雷及相关装备，这笔交易价值约23亿美元，五角大楼周二宣布。【原文：The U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale of maritime patrol and reconnaissance aircraft and lightweight torpedoes and related equipment to Singapore in a deal valued at an estimated $2.3 billion, the Pentagon said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，黑石集团正考虑以50亿美元出售Beacon Offshore公司
item.description: 彭博社周二援引知情人士消息报道，黑石集团正就出售旗下Beacon Offshore Energy公司进行谈判，该公司在美国墨西哥湾运营油气资产，交易金额可能超过50亿美元。【原文：Blackstone is in talks to sell its Beacon Offshore Energy, which operates oil and gas assets in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico for more than $5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会将就Meta反垄断案中涉及Instagram和WhatsApp收购的裁决提起上诉
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会发言人周二表示，该机构将提起上诉，试图重启其指控Facebook母公司Meta Platforms通过收购Instagram和WhatsApp来巩固非法垄断地位的案件。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission will file an appeal seeking to revive its case accusing Facebook parent company Meta Platforms of bolstering an illegal monopoly by acquiring Instagram and WhatsApp, the FTC's spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI在ChatGPT上推出年龄预测功能
item.description: OpenAI周二宣布，将在全球范围内推出ChatGPT年龄预测功能，用于判断账户是否可能由未成年人持有。这家人工智能初创企业正准备允许其热门聊天机器人显示成人内容。【原文：OpenAI on Tuesday said it is rolling out age prediction on ChatGPT globally, to determine whether an account is likely owned by a minor, as the artificial intelligence startup prepares to allow adult content on the popular chatbot.】
